If i haven't had played Portal 2 before this, i would've said, this is the best 3D platformer I've played so far. But  I had, so Portal only gets the second place. Got me a couple of hellish hours, trying to get those speedrun challanges down. Very fun game :D

This stands as a game I will always rank highly. The puzzles were difficult, but able to be completed in a reasonable amount of time before I delved into insanity, and the simplicity of each of the rooms appealed to the tidier part of me.

With many parts of the game leaving you stuck for many, many minutes, the humour really stuck out to me. It was on key for the entirety of the game, and GLaDOS...

GLaDOS was simply perfection. 
Great game.

Мне понравилась игра

Fair warning: I played and finished Portal 2 before playing this game. The puzzles make you think a bit and the writing is hilarious, though there isn't really much by way of a direct story. The music is ambient; not very demanding of your attention. The game is really really short, I finished it in 2 hours and that's without trying too hard to finish it, though that might just be because I was familiar with the sequel. 

It's really amazing to see how far Valve took this franchise in the sequel after playing this one, 2 is just better in every way. That's not to say this game is bad though, it's great, but 2 just takes (almost) everything this game has to the next level. This game was revolutionary in 2007, and it's still great, but wait for a sale to buy this one, it can get really pricey for the time you spend on it otherwise.

정말 잘 만든 게임이다. 스토리 탄탄하며 퍼즐의 구조도 정말 획기적이다. 플레이 타임이 조금 작지만 지금 할인율이 미친듯하기 때문에 문제 될것이 전혀없다. 유일하게 하나 단점을 뽑자면 도전과제의 난이도가 정말너무 어렵다. 애퍼쳐사이언스 도전과제는 공략을 보고도 못하겠다. 
그것 빼고는 희대의 수작임.

Despite being overshadowed by it's older sister Portal 2.  This game still remains a cult classic years later and is ingrained in pop culture throughout the years.  Truly an innovation for it's time and still worth a play today if you haven't tried it yet.

°Juego
Puzzles, portales, torretas, caidas y un poco de vista con musica de una buena radio esta hecho Portal, tranquilo si quitas, quemas y transportas pasas el primer nivel pero oye... no dudas algo en el cubo de compañia...

°Modos de juego.
-Campaña
-Mapas de bonificacion (Desafios, Camaras avanzadas)

°Graficos.
graficos buenos ya es una de las penultimas franquisias de Valve y con su entrenamiento con las demas deja buenos resultados.

°Historia.
Trata de la empresa Aperture Science hacer experimentos con portales a humanos que lo lleva de algo en peligro a resolver puzzles.

Recomendado 70%.

SCIENCE!

What can I say? It's hecking Portal, The darling of the Orange Box made by a small team, that blossomed into a hysterically funny, interesting game with unique puzzles and interactions. The humour is meta and effortless and GLaDOS is easily one of the best written characters out there. To be frank I struggle to find a flaw in Portal at all, something that's hard to say for most games. Great puzzles, great dialogue, great mechanics, great game.

The only bad thing, it is too short (fortunately that is fixed in Portal 2).

Há anos eu tenho vontade de jogar isto e devo dizer que a espera não diminuiu nem um pouco a genialidade do jogo. Portal I é curto, mas, único. Zerei com apenas algumas horas e não estava particularmente "rushando" nada, mas mesmo sendo pequeno, ele me divertiu bastante com os puzzles e com os monólogos da GLaDOS (que aliás, é uma das personagens mais carismáticas e divertidas que eu já vi). Resumidamente, o jogo é bom e divertido, cheio de puzzles que mesmo não sendo tão difíceis, entretêm bastante. 

The cake wasn't a lie.
